item.title: WIRED Tested Dozens of Blenders. These Are Our 9 Favorites (2025)
item.description: The perfect kitchen companions, these versatile blenders can whip up breakfasts, dips, milkshakes, cocktails, and everything in between.

item.title: Science Reveals the Surprising Origins of the Potato
item.description: Potatoes as we know them today are the product of a hybridization that took place 9 million years ago between two plants, one of which was an ancestor of the tomato.

item.title: Taste testing battery-flavored tortilla chips
item.description: I get a lot of odd pitches in my inbox, but “9V battery-flavored corn chips” still stopped me in my tracks. My mind was ringing with questions (What? Who? Why!?!), but most importantly: What are they
